label: Regulatory Check
description: Check ingredients or formulas against open regulatory data by market and usage context

defaultInputs.name: Formula or Ingredient List
defaultInputs.description: Formula or ingredient list to be checked against regulatory data

defaultInputs.name: Target Market
defaultInputs.description: Target regulatory market (e.g. EU, US, ASEAN)

defaultInputs.name: Target User
defaultInputs.description: Target user group (e.g. gender and age range)

defaultOutputs.name: Regulatory Status
defaultOutputs.description: Regulatory result: PASS, FAIL, or UNKNOWN

defaultOutputs.name: Regulatory Warnings
defaultOutputs.description: List of regulatory warnings or restrictions

defaultOutputs.name: Reasoning
defaultOutputs.description: Short explanation for the regulatory result (may be blurred)
